thread.title_full: javascript - jQuery : on horizontal scroll tell which element is in viewport - Stack Overflow

posts.author: Nolan.K
posts.text:
Assuming #stickers has the right CSS to make overflow scroll (if not, your scroll handler will never fire.)
var scrollingIsThrottled = false; var sticker = $(".sticker"); $("#stickers").scroll(function() { var stickers_width = $(this).width(); if (!scrollingIsThrottled) { scrollingIsThrottled = true; var StickerMatchingExpression = sticker.filter(function() { var $this = $(this); var left_of_element = $this.offset().left; var right_of_element = left_of_element + $this.width(); return 0 <= left_of_element && right_of_element <= stickers_width; }); scrollingIsThrottled = false; } });

posts.text: WALLACE RONEY QUINTET Viernes 10   Fue uno de los pocos músicos de su generación que aprendieron y perfeccionaron su arte directamente de alianzas con los grandes maestros del jazz. Pero su relación más importante y significativa fue con Miles Davis, mentor y amigo, con el que trabajó y estudió hasta la muerte de este último, con la distinción de ser el único intérprete de trompeta al que Davis tuteló personalmente. Su asociación alcanzó su punto máximo cuando Miles eligió a Wallace para compartir escenario en su histórica actuación en Montreux en 1991. Después de que Davis muriera, Herbie Hancock, Ron Carter, Wayne Shorter, Tony Williams y Wallace Roney se unieron y actuaron por todo el mundo con un elogiado tributo. Publicado por

thread.title: Taxpayers funding £17k fly-tipping costs
thread.title_full: Taxpayers funding £17k fly-tipping costs

posts.author: Chris Smith
posts.title: Taxpayers funding £17k fly-tipping costs
posts.text:
FLY-tipping is continuing to rise in Stratford-on-Avon with the district council spending more than £17,000 over the last year clearing up mess. 
Newly-published figures show there were 291 incidents across the district between April 2016 and March this year. 
That was slightly up on the previous year when Stratford District Council paid £14,462 clearing up waste, with 282 incidents reported. 
During that two-year period the council also spent more than £4,300 investigating incidents, but did not manage to recoup any of that money through fines. 
However it is believed the council has had more success on this front since April this year. 
Cllr Mike Brain, community and technical services portfolio holder for the council, said: “Fly-tipping is on the increase nationwide. 
“The additional costs encountered by the district council last year were down to the investigative works carried out by our officers to identify offenders. 
“Since April this year, we now have the ability to issue fixed penalty notices, which is £400, for fly-tipping, which makes it more effective to enforce against fly-tippers. 
“We had our first fixed penalty notice paid this year, and one successful prosecution where the offender was fined £6,000 and the district council was awarded costs of £3,100. 
“The council is committed to enforcing against fly- tipping, and will issue fixed penalty notices or prosecute where possible. CCTV and public evidence is invaluable in catching and successfully prosecuting culprits carrying out this anti-social behaviour.” 
In neighbouring Warwick district, the number of fly- tipping incidents is significantly higher, but fell to 835 incidents between April 2016 and March this year, at a clean up cost of around £30,000 compared to 1,092 incidents the previous year. TAGS

thread.title_full: 中日・福本臨時コーチ 京田にハッパ「来年が勝負」（東スポWeb）

posts.title: 中日・福本臨時コーチ 京田にハッパ「来年が勝負」（東スポWeb）
posts.text: 中日の臨時コーチを務めていた元阪急の福本豊氏（７０＝評論家）が７日、ひと足早くナゴヤ球場での秋季キャンプを打ち上げた。 歴代最多１０６５盗塁を誇るとあって走塁はもちろん、打撃などの指導を３日間にわたって行った。特に新人王候補の京田について「今年はホンマに頑張ったと思うが、来年が勝負。体の強さは一番の財産やから、成績は今年以上に上げないといけない。１００何個（１０５）の三振を半分ぐらいにすればその分、２０回ぐらい走者として出られる。まず塁に出ないと」とハッパをかけた。 この日が７０歳の誕生日。報道陣からサプライズでケーキを贈られると「ありがたいね」と笑顔で頬張った。

thread.title: Травми в лагера на Марица преди домакинството на Енисей
thread.title_full: Травми в лагера на Марица преди домакинството на Енисей

posts.title: Травми в лагера на Марица преди домакинството на Енисей
posts.text:
07 ноември 2017, 11:28 0 източник: volleymaritza.bg vesti.bg 
За първия мач помежду си от третия кръг в женската Шампионска лига по волейбол отборите на Марица Пловдив и Енисей Красноярск се лишиха от услугите на по една своя основна волейболистка заради травми. 
Централната блокировачка на българските шампионки Милена Димова получи болки в кръста по време на тренировка във Финландия и не влезе в игра на мача реванш с ЛП Сало. Димова не попадна в групата на "жълто-сините" и за гостуването на Берое от първия кръг в Националната волейболна лига, пише официалният сайт на ВК Марица Пловдив. 
Надеждите болката да отшуми напълно за двубоя с Енисей не се оправдаха и Милена Димова отново не попадна сред 14-те волейболистки на треньора Иван Петков за важното домакинство. 
Мача Марица - Енисей можете за гледате от 18 часа в GONG PLAY и по телевизия DIEMA SPORT . 
Вместо нея, в групата за мача довечера място намери Мирела Шахпазова, с която наличните разпределителки в състава стават три. 
Бронзовият медалист от руската Суперлига за 2017-а година пък пристигна в Пловдив с 12 състезателки от общо 13-те, които треньорът Александр Кошкин има на разположение през този сезон. 
Кметът на Пловдив Иван Тотев, в компанията на мениджъра на Марица Борис Халачев, вчера призова своите съграждани да напълнят зала "Колодрума" в подкрепа на пловдивския тим, тъй като публиката може да се окаже важен фактор в отстраняването на силния съперник за историческо влизане в групите на Шампионската лига.

posts.author: Berita Islam 24H (noreply@blogger.com)
posts.title: UBN Bakal Sapa Umat Islam Karanganyar
posts.text:
UBN Bakal Sapa Umat Islam Karanganyar 
Berita Islam 24H - Aliansi Umat Islam (AUI) Karanganyar bakal menggelar Kajian Akbar bersama Ustadz Bahtiar Nasir (UBN) di Lapangan belakang DPRD kabupaten Karanganyar, pada Ahad tanggal 19 November 2017. 
Ustadz Fadlun Ali, ketua panitia menjelaskan bahwa agenda yang sudah dirancang jauh hari sebenarnya akan digelar di Masjid Agung Karanganyar. Berdasar pertimbangan peserta yang bakal membludak, pihaknya memilih dipindah ke lokasi terbuka. 
“Pertimbangan kita bakal puluhan ribu yang akan hadir, sementara kapasitas Masjid Agung sekitar 5 ribu orang, ini nggak bakal muat. Dan lantai bawah Masjid juga akan dipakai walimah, maka alternatif lapangan DPRD,” katanya pada Panjimas, Selasa (7/11/2017). 
Saat ini, AUI Karanganyar sedang berkoordinasi dengan pihak-pihak terkait agar jalannya acara bisa kondusif dan nyaman. Dia meminta umat Islam Soloraya bisa hadir dalam kajian yang bertema “Meneladani Kepemimpinan Rasulullah” dengan pembicara utama ketua GNPF Ulama itu. 
“Alhamdulillah pagi ini kita sudah bertemu Bupati dan insyaAllah berlanjut. Silahkan ajak keluarga dan saudara handai taulan untuk bisa hadir,” ujarnya. [ beritaislam24h.info / pmc ]

posts.author: Uutissyöte
posts.title: Kehittäjien pitkään kaipaama ominaisuus tulossa Applen App Storeen – luvassa ale-hintoja...
posts.text:
Apple tulee tuomaan uuden mahdollisuuden sovelluskehittäjille tulevassa iOS 11.2 -päivityksessä.
Jatkossa sovelluskehittäjät voivat tarjota maksullisen tilauksen sisältävissä sovelluksissaan käyttäjille aluksi edullisemman hinnan joksikin aikaa. Mahdollisuus on erittäin odotettu sovelluskehittäjien taholta. Tähän asti mahdollista on ollut vain täysin ilmaisten kokeilujaksojen tarjoaminen.
Uusi mahdollisuus on tulossa tarjolle automaattisesti uusiutuville tilauksille.
Apple on tehnyt viimeisinä vuosina useita muutoksia App Storeen. Tämän syksyn iOS 11:ssä App Store -sovellus meni kokonaan uusiksi ja kauppa muun muassa jakautui erillisiin Apit- ja Pelit-osioihin sekä sai täysin uudelleen suunnitellun etusivun.
Aiemmin Apple otti itselleen 30 prosenttia myös kaikista App Store -tilausmaksuista. Viime kesänä tähän tuli muutos, kun Apple leikkasi osuutensa 15 prosenttiin yli vuoden jatkuneista tilauksista.
iOS 11.2 ja sen myötä uusia alemman hinnan tilaustarjouksia on tulossa todennäköisesti joulukuussa.

thread.title: Сами того не зная, мы едим много древесины
thread.title_full: Сами того не зная, мы едим много древесины

posts.title: Сами того не зная, мы едим много древесины
posts.text: Next Сами того не зная, мы едим много древесины Древесное волокно, также известное как целлюлоза, используется везде: от сыров до соуса для салата, кексов и клубничных сиропов. Пищевые предприятия используют ее для уплотнения и стабилизации продуктов, замены жира и увеличения содержания клетчатки, а также для того, чтобы свести к минимуму зависимость от более дорогостоящих ингредиентов, таких как масло и мука. Порошок целлюлозы производят путем переработки первичной древесной массы в химических веществах, для отделения целлюлозы, а затем очищения. Модифицированные версии требуют дополнительной обработки, как например воздействия кислоты, чтобы отделить клетчатку. Как это ни странно, но с увеличением информированности о ценности пищевых продуктов, увеличилось и использование целлюлозы, так как теперь продукт может похвастаться меньшим содержанием жира и большим количеством клетчатки. И не обращайте внимание, что это древесина. Стоит упомянуть, что многие сети фаст-фуда включают целлюлозу в производство своих продуктов.

posts.title: 부산국비지원교육, 수강료 부담없이 배우는 게임개발
posts.text:
게임개발교육 팁 부산국비지원교육, 수강료 부담없이 배우는 게임개발 18시간 전 URL 복사 본문 기타 기능 번역보기 http://blog.naver.com/ognstudio/221134654318
부산국비지원교육
수강료 부담없이 배우는
게임개발
안녕하세요!
이제 수능이 열흘도 안남았는데요!
대한민국의 모든 고3 수험생들 남은시간동안
화이팅입니다!!!
날이 가면 갈수록 세상이 변화하고 그에 따라
많은 사람들이 즐기는 게 임에도 많은 변화가
생겼습니다!
그러면서 게임을 즐기던 사람들이 이제는 직접
게임을 만들고자 하죠!
그런데 게임을 개발하는 일은 전문적인 일이기
때문에 과정들을 배우기 위해서 들어가는
수강료가 부담이 될 수밖에 없는데요!
하지만 게임개발 과정도 국비지원이 가능한
부산국비지원교육기관이 있 다고 해요!
그렇다면 국비지원이 뭔지에 대해서
알아봐야겠죠?
국비지원은 고용노동부에서 주관하는
교육제도인데요!
인적자원개발을 통한 경쟁력 제고, 고용안정
추구 그리고 근로자의 평생 능력 개발까지
지원해주는 교육제도입니다!
국비지원을 이야기하면 빠질 수 없는
내일배움카드가 있는데요~
내일배움카드제는 취업, 창업을 위해서 훈련이
필요한 실업자와 영세자 그리고 영업자들에게
직업능력 개발훈련을 참여하도록 훈련비를
지원해 주면서 훈련이력도 같이 관리해주는
제도입니다!
더욱 자세한 내용들은 아래 링크를 통해서
확인하세요!
부산국비지원교육 설명 포스팅
이렇게 좋은 제도를 모르고 그냥 지나친다면
안되겠죠!
특히 게임개발에 대해서 배우고 싶은데
수강료가 부담스러워 포기했던 분들에겐
부산국비지원교육기관에서 부담없이
게임개발자를 준비할 수 있겠죠!!
오늘은 이 게임개발 과정 중에서
게임그래픽을 알아보려합니다!
게임그래픽은 게임 컨셉에 따라 제작된
게임원화를 토대로 게임에 실제 로 들어갈
캐릭터와 배경, 오브젝트 등의 게임 속
이미지들을 그래픽 요 소로 제작하는 작업을
말합니다!
이러한 그래픽작업을 할 때는 대표적으로
3Ds MAX 툴을 많이 사용하 게 되는데요!
3Ds MAX는 3D모델링과 렌더링, 애니메이팅
전부 다 가능한 다재다능 툴이죠!
그래서 전 세계적으로도 가장 많이 쓰이게
되는 3D 툴 중 하나이죠~
3D 툴을 다루게 될 때는 x, y 축이 아닌
x, y, z 이 세가지 축을 전부 보 면서 작업을
해야해서 3D 툴을 제대로 다루기 위해선
남들보다 조형감 각이 뛰어나야 하죠!
그리고 그 밖에도 툴에 대한 이해를 제대로
하고 있어야 작업에 있어서 막힘이 없겠죠~
그래서 이런 전문교육을 통해서 기초과정을
제대로 배우는 것이 중요한 데요!
수강료 부담으로 인해서 독학으로 배우려고
하시는 분들도 많으시죠!
하지만 독학으로 배우려고 하기에는 힘든
부분들이 많이 있는데요,
현재 그래픽디자이너로 활동을 하고 계신
분들도 교육기관을 통해서 계 속해서 공부를
하고 계신분들이 많다고 해요!
그런데 아무것도 모르는 상황에서 독학만으로
게임그래픽디자이너가 된 다는건 아무래도
엄청 어렵고 힘들겠죠!
게다가 부담되는 수강료의 경우에는
부산국비지원교육기관을 통해서 걱 정을
덜어낼 수 있겠죠?
하지만 국비지원교육이 가능하다고 아무
교육기관이나 갈 수는 없어요!
부산국비지원교육기관을 찾을 때는 교육을
진행하고 있는 강사진들과 교육의 질이 얼마나
높은지를 제일 우선적으로 확인해야 합니다!
그래서 소개해드립니다!
탑클래스 강사진들의 퀄리티높은 교육으로
수강생들의 실력을 실무수준 까지 제대로
잡아주는 부산국비지원교육기관,
아텐츠게임아카데미입니 다!
부산국비지원교육기관 아텐츠게임아카데미는
국내외 최고의 게임개발 사에서 오랜시간동안
근무해온 강사진들이 경력과 노하우로
체계적이며 퀄리티높은 교육을 진행하고
있습니다!
그리고 1:1 커리큘럼 방식의 교육으로
수강생들 개인에 맞는 진도와 꾸 준한 관리를
해주기 때문에 수강생들의 실력과 포트폴리오
수준 또한 엄 청나게 끌어올려주기로
유명하다고 해요!
그러다 보니 넥슨, 넷마블, NC소프트 등
국내 메이저 게임회사부터 EA 코리아 등의
외국계 게임회사, 그 외의 다양한
게임개발사들로 수강생들 이 꾸준히 취업을
성공하고 있다고 합니다!
그리고 아텐츠게임아카데미가 11월 한달동안
게임개발 무료특강을 진 행한다고 합니다!
대기업 게임회사 경력의 강사님들의
1:1 피드백과 시연을 통해서 자신 의 실력도
더욱 기를 수 있는 좋은 기회겠죠~
그리고 그 외에도 아텐츠게임아카데미는
11월 16일부터 19일까지 총 4일간 부산
벡스코에서 진행하는 G-STAR 2017에
공식 참가 기관으로 선정되었죠!
G-STAR 참가 기념으로 수강료 할인도
진행하고 G-STAR 초청권도 증 정한다고 하니
이런 좋은 기회 놓치지 마세요~~
아텐츠게임아카데미는 2017 대한민국 브랜드
어워즈에서 대한민국 교 육서비스
게임교육부문 브랜드대상을 수상한
교육기관이에요!
2017 대한민국 브랜드 어워즈는 우리나라의
경제성장에 핵심이 될만한 브랜드를 선별하는
행사인데요,
이런 행사에서 게임교육부문 대상을
수상했다고 하니 아텐츠의 교육 퀄 리티를
다시 한번 알 수 있겠네요!
아텐츠게임아카데미는 교육부에서 선정한
교육기부 진로체험 기관이기 도 합니다!
그 외에도 게임사와 대학교에서도
검증을 받았다고 합니다!
부산국비지원교육기관,
아텐츠게임아카데미에서 수강료 부담도
줄이고 자신이 만들고자 했던 게임개발의
꿈도 이뤄보세요!

posts.title: Striscia la Notizia: Francesco Monte riceve un Tapiro molto particolare
posts.text: Striscia la Notizia: Francesco Monte riceve un Tapiro molto particolare Il tradimento di Cecilia Rodriguez è costato una consegna speciale commenta Il primo attapirato della settimana è Francesco Monte , lasciato in diretta di fronte a milioni di italiani da Cecilia Rodriguez che dall'interno della casa gli ha preferito il ciclista Ignazio Moser . Un tapiro, quello consegnato da Valerio Staffelli , modificato apposta per l'occasione: un vistoso corno sulla fronte ruba fra le risate un'imprecazione a Monte. "Ad oggi sinceramente c'è poco da perdonare, in base a quello che ho visto" confessa all'inviato di Striscia la Notizia . "Quando uscirà dalla Casa le parlerò e mi toglierò un peso dallo stomaco".

posts.title: 11 кръга, а нито дузпа за Реал
posts.text:
Перес готви трансферна бомба до 2 години 
Вестник „Марка” се поразрови историческите архиви и отчете, че подобна поредица не се случвала от доста дълго време. Всъщност за последно Реал не получи наказателен удар в 11 поредни шампионатни мача през 1981 година. За да осъзнаем колко отдавна всъщност е било това, изданието подчертава, че нито един от настоящия тим на „лос бланкос” не е бил роден тогава. 
В същото време Реал не бива да се чувства ощетен, защото не е сам. Още три клуба от Ла Лига се намират в същото положение. Става дума за Атлетик Билбао, Селта Виго и Ейбар.

thread.title: The Latest: Moon, Trump agree on South Korean missiles
thread.title_full: The Latest: Moon, Trump agree on South Korean missiles - The Economic Times

posts.author: timesofindia.indiatimes.com
posts.title: The Latest: Moon, Trump agree on South Korean missiles
posts.text:
SEOUL, South Korea (AP) — The Latest on President Donald Trump's trip to Asia (all times local):
5:47 p.m.
South Korea's president says he and President Donald Trump have finalized an earlier agreement to allow South Korea to possess more powerful missiles in the face of growing North Korean threats.
President Moon Jae-in said Tuesday the two have agreed on lifting the warhead payload limits on South Korean ballistic missiles. He says they're also cooperating on strengthening South Korea's defense capabilities through the acquisition or development of advanced weapons systems.
Moon says Trump also reaffirmed the "iron-clad" U.S. security commitment for South Korea during a joint news conference with the American leader on Wednesday.
Trump is in South Korea as the second leg of his first visit to Asia.
__
5:46 p.m.
South Korea's leader says he and President Donald Trump have agreed to place maximized pressures and sanctions on North Korea to peacefully defuse a standoff caused by the North's weapons programs.
But President Moon Jae-in says Tuesday that he and Trump also reaffirmed they are ready to provide North Korea with a "bright future" if the country gives ups its nuclear and missile programs.
Moon made the comments after summit talks with Trump at the South Korean presidential office of Blue House on Tuesday. Trump arrived in South Korea earlier Tuesday as the second leg of his first Asian tour.
__
5:45 p.m.
President Donald Trump says "good progress" is happening on North Korea as he urges Pyongyang to "come to the table" and "make a deal."
Trump is speaking at a joint news conference in Seoul with South Korea's President Moon Jae-in. Amid rising tensions with North Korea, he says: "it makes sense for North Korea to do the right thing."
The president is not offering specifics on the type of progress being made. But Trump says it "really makes sense for North Korea to come to the table and make a deal." He added that "I do see certain movement," but did not offer specifics.
__
4:59 p.m.
President Donald Trump is beginning his two-day Korean peninsula visit walking amid weapons of war but voicing optimism for peace.
His every move will be closely watched from both sides of Korea's demilitarized zone.
Trump has repeatedly delivered combative warnings to Pyongyang as he urged it to abandon its nuclear program.
But as he began his two-day South Korean visit just three dozen miles from the heavily-fortified DMZ, he initially struck a different, more hopeful tone.
He declared that "it always works out. Has to work out."
That echoed the sentiment of his tweet hours earlier, when he left Japan for South Korea, the second stop of his lengthy Asian trip. It is centered on pressuring North Korean dictator Kim Jong to abandon his weapons program.
(This story has not been edited by economictimes.com and is auto–generated from a syndicated feed we subscribe to.) 0 Comments

thread.title: (Özel Haber) Zeytinyağı kalite bakımından 3 sınıfa ayrılıyor
thread.title_full: (Özel Haber) Zeytinyağı kalite bakımından 3 sınıfa ayrılıyor | Erzurum Flaş Haber

posts.author: erzurumflas.com
posts.title: (Özel Haber) Zeytinyağı kalite bakımından 3 sınıfa ayrılıyor
posts.text:
Zeytinyağının kalitesine ve kimyasal yapılarına göre; natürel sızma, natürel birinci ve Riviera olarak üç ayrı sınıfa ayrıldığı belirtildi.
Türkiye’nin önemli zeytinyağı üretim merkezlerinden olan Balıkesir’in Edremit ilçesinde uzmanlar, vatandaşların farklı fiyatlarda zeytinyağını raflarda gördüğünü, bunun nedeninin de zeytinyağında 3 farklı sınıfın olmasından kaynaklandığını ifade ediyorlar. Natürel sızma yağların çiğ olarak tüketilmesini tavsiye eden uzmanlar, natürel birinci yağın asit değerleri nedeniyle yemeklik olarak tüketilmesini tavsiye ediyorlar. Riviera yağların ise yüksek asit değerine sahip zeytinyağlarının rafine edildikten sonra belli oranlarda natürel sızma zeytinyağları ile karıştırılması ile elde edildiğini ifade ediyorlar.
Balıkesir Üniversitesi Edremit Meslek Yüksek Okulu Zeytin ve Zeytin Teknolojileri Öğretim Görevlisi Mücahit Kıvrak, “Zeytinyağımızın çeşitleri natürel sızma zeytinyağı 0.8’e kadar. Ama biz burada çeşitleri hem kimyasalda hem de duyusalda analiz yaparak belirliyoruz. Ama halkımızın bildiği daha çok asitlik derecesine göre bir sınıflandırma yapılıyor. 0.8’e kadar olanlar natürel sızma, 0.8 ile 2.0 arasında natürel birinci. İkinin üzerinde yemeklik sınıfından çıkıp rafinajlık sınıfa geçiyor. O rafinajlık sınıfında yağlarını rafine edildikten sonra içerisine yüzde 15 kadar natürel sızma zeytinyağı koyduktan sonra bunun adına da Riviera diyoruz. Halkımızın bildiği, tüketicilerin rafta gördüğü 3 tane farklı zeytinyağı sınıfına ait ürünümüz var. Natürel sızma, natürel birinci ve Riviera” dedi.
3 farklı zeytinyağı sınıfı arasında fiyat farklılıklarının olduğunu ifade eden Kıvrak “Eğer tüketicilerimiz yemeklerde ayrı, çiğden salatalara tüketecekleri, sabah aç karına içecekleri zeytinyağlarını ayrı tüketirler ise bu ekonomi anlamında kendilerine bir katkı sağlayacaktır. Yemeklik zeytinyağlarını ve natürel zeytinyağlarını bence ayırmalılar” dedi.

thread.title: Pirlo se retiró de las canchas y lo vamos a extrañar
thread.title_full: Pirlo se retiró de las canchas y lo vamos a extrañar

posts.author: Raúl Gutiérrez
posts.title: Pirlo se retiró de las canchas y lo vamos a extrañar
posts.text:
— AC Milan (@acmilan) 6 de noviembre de 2017 Con los Rossoneri , Pirlo ganó dos Champions League y dos Scudettos de la Serie A y los reflectores mundiales se enfocaron en él. Con la selección italiana destacó en el mundial de Alemania 2006, donde la escuadra Azurri alzó el trofeo de campeón tras ganarle en penales a la Francia de Zidane (el partido del cabezazo), donde Pirlo abrió la tanda desde los 11 pasos. Aunque siempre estuvo en la mira del Real Madrid y el Barcelona, Pirlo decidió jugar para la Juventus, una decisión que le partió el corazón a los fanáticos del Milan pero que dibujó una sonrisa enorme en los Biaconeri . Con la Vecchia Signora de Italia ganó cuatro títulos de liga italiana y se quedo al filo de llevarse su tercera Champions League , pero cayó ante el Barcelona en la final de la temporada 2014 – 2015 en el Olímpico de Berlín. 
Así recordaron el paso de Pirlo por Turín: 
— JuventusFC (@juventusfces) 6 de noviembre de 2017 Decidió migrar a Nueva York, dónde ayer terminó su carrera, debido a una lesión en la rodilla que no lo ha dejado de molestar, pero le regaló tres años de magia y futbol a todos los neoyorquinos y seguidores del futbol en los Estados Unidos. 

— New York City FC (@NYCFC) 6 de noviembre de 2017 No cabe duda de que extrañaremos a Pirlo, pero siempre con el recuerdo del gran futbolista que fue, de los trazos largos y al pie que salían de sus botines y de todo el amor que le dio al futbol durante 23 años de su vida. Y no, no estamos llorando, se nos metió un golazo de Pirlo en el ojo. HABLAMOS DE:

thread.title_full: (USA-CA-Granada Hills) Commercial Account Manager

posts.title: (USA-CA-Granada Hills) Commercial Account Manager
posts.text:
Pep Boys Commercial Account Manager in Granada Hills , California 
##Job Description 
Overview Auto Plus SM is a U.S.-based leading automotive aftermarket company with over 3,500 employees in over 270 locations throughout the country. On February 4, 2016, Icahn Enterprises L.P. acquired The Pep Boys -- Manny, Moe & Jack with the intent to combine the operations of Pep Boys and Auto Plus. Since 1921, Pep Boys has been a leading automotive aftermarket chain. With over 7,500 service bays in over 800 locations in 35 states and Puerto Rico, Pep Boys offers name-brand tires; automotive maintenance and repair; parts and expert advice for the Do-It Yourselfer; commercial auto parts delivery; and fleet maintenance and repair. Combined, Auto Plus and Pep Boys (the "Company") have approximately 23,000 employees in over 1,000 locations in the United States and Puerto Rico and $3 billion in annual sales. 
Position Summary Responsible for creating customer value through establishing long-term customer relationships that lead to increased overall sales and profitability for the company. 
This position will support stores in Lancaster, Palmdale, Granada Hills, Panorama City and Sherman Oaks. 
Duties & Responsibilities Meet or exceed weekly, monthly and annual sales and service goals. Develop plans, with management, to achieve these goals and objectives. Develop new customers to meet sales goals. Make regular, planned sales calls to all customers and utilize the assistance of factor representatives to make field calls in order to leverage the company's sales and/or service efforts. Maintain knowledge of the company's selling system principles. Ensure all paperwork is accurate and complete. Develop and maintain positive customer relationships. Serve customer needs at all times in a way that ends in a satisfied customer and a sale for the company. Assist in the collection of accounts receivable for accounts that require a weekly change and/or are delinquent according to company credit terms. Develop new ideas that will help improve company image, sales and operations. Communicate to store and divisional general manager's information observed and gathered in the field regarding customer service and support level, new or existing customers, competitors and wholesale marketing programs. Additional duties as assigned.

thread.title: احتمال حضور خارجی‌ها در بازار سرمایه ایران
thread.title_full: احتمال حضور خارجی‌ها در بازار سرمایه ایران

posts.author: info@bultannews.com
posts.title: احتمال حضور خارجی‌ها در بازار سرمایه ایران
posts.text:
قاصدک 24، بلیط ارزان هواپیما 
به گزارش بولتن نیوز، مدتی است که برخی از فعالان بازار سرمایه از معاملات الگوریتمی استفاده می‌کنند و درباره این نوع معاملات صحبت‌های زیادی در بازار سرمایه می شود، در این روزها نخستین نرم افزار الگوریتمی سنجش گردش نقدینگی در بازار سهام با حضور جمعی از کارشناسان و مدیران بازار سرمایه رونمایی شد. 
بهادر شمس، کارشناس بازار سرمایه و عضو کانون کارگزاران در نشستی که به مناسبت این رونمایی برگزار شد با اشاره به کارکردهای این نرم افزار دانش بنیان گفت: این نرم افزار با پردازشگری قدرتمند داده‌های بازار سهام تحت عنوان متاویو امکان رصد چرخش نقدینگی در بازار سهام را برای نخستین بار برای عموم ذی نفعان بازار سرمایه فراهم آورده است. 
وی با بیان اینکه این نرم افزار دیده بان هوشمند بازار سرمایه برای رصد رخدادهای میان سرمایه گذاران حقیقی و حقوقی بازار سهام که گاهی در میان اعداد و ارقام پنهان می شوند می ‌واند مورد استفاده متولیان بازار سرمایه و عموم سرمایه‌گذاران قرار گیرد، افزود: شاید در بازار سهام کوچکی مثل امارات که ۶۰ شرکت در آن حضور دارند یافتن این موارد چندان دشوار نباشد، اما در بورس ایران که بیش از ۵۰۰ نماد معاملاتی وجود دارد نیاز به چنین امکانی همواره احساس می شود. 
این مقام مسئول با اشاره به اینکه نرم افزار متاویو دانش بنیان و در راستای سیاست های اقتصاد مقاومتی است، گفت:هیچ نمونه خارجی برای این خدمت تاکنون در بازار سرمایه مشاهده نشده و از روز نخست بر اساس نیاز بازار سهام ایران طراحی و کاملا بومی کشور ایران است. 
وی از بکار گیری نیروهای متخصص داخلی برای تولید این نرم افزار سخن گفت و با اشاره به وضعیت بازار سرمایه و دورنمای آن عنوان کرد: در حال حاضر بازار سهام با حجم معاملات پایین روبرو است و این در حالی است که شاخص کل بورس وضعیت مناسبی را تجربه می‌کند بطوریکه انتظار می رود طی ماه های آینده سقف تاریخی شاخص کل بورس شکسته شود. تحلیل‌ها نیز نشان می‌دهد بزودی سقف ۸۹ هزار واحدی شاخص حتی با وجود بازگشایی نماد معاملاتی بانک‌ها شکسته خواهد شد. 
شمس با بیان اینکه متغیرهای مختلفی باعث جذاب شدن بازار سهام ایران شده گفت: انتظار می رود کاهش نرخ سود بانکی که باعث کاهش جذابیت سپرده گذاری در بانک ها برای صاحبان نقدینگی شده به گرایش سرمایه گذاران به سمت بازار سهام منتهی خواهد شد. 
وی در برابر این پرسش که آیا بازار سرمایه ایران برای جذب سرمایه خارجی جذابیت لازم را در بر دارد، گفت: نسبت قیمت بر درآمدی بازار سهام ایران بسیار پایین‌تر از بازارهای منطقه است، اما برخی ریسک‌های سیاسی از جمله تحریم یا فشار های سیاسی هر سرمایه‌گذاری را دچار تردید می کند با این همه می بینیم که بطور محدود گرایش سرمایه گذاران خارجی به بازار سرمایه ایران در حال رخ دادن است هر چند که تعداد خارجی ها زیاد نیست. 
شمس افزود: شاید تحریم ها در اقتصاد کلان اثر گذار باشند، اما در بازار سرمایه اثرات آنها کمی متفاوت تراست. کما اینکه در سال های ۱۳۹۰ و ۱۳۹۱ قطعنامه‌های متعددی صادر شد، اما بازار سهام روند متفاوتی را طی کرد و بسیار جذاب تر شد و حتی تغییرات در بازار ارز به سودآوری شرکت‌ها و رقابت آنها در بازار برای فروش محصولات کمک کرد که افزایش سوداوری را نیز در پی داشت. از اینرو الزاماً تشدید تحریم های یکطرفه برخی قدرت های غربی باعث نخواهد شد که دورنمای بازار دچار نااطمینانی شود. 
در ادامه این جلسه میثم مقدم، تحلیلگر و کارشناس بازار سرمایه با اشاره به کارکرد های نرم افزار دانش بنیان رصد چرخش نقدینگی در بازار سهام ایران گفت: متاویو نرم افزاری رایگان با رویکرد الگوریتمی است که برای کمک به معاملات فعلان بازار سرمایه به ویژه تحلیلگران تکنیکال طراحی شده است. 
وی افزود: این نرم افزار به تحلیل گران کمک می کند تا همواره تمامی سهم های بازار را بر مبنای سیستم معاملاتی خود با دقت بیشتری رصد کنند. استفاده از این نرم افزار به هیچ وجه نیازمند دانش برنامه نویسی و کد نویسی نبوده و با پردازشگر قدرتمند خود چشم هوشمند هر سرمایه گذاری در رصد بازار سرمایه خواهد بود. 
مقدم با اشاره به کارکرد های این نرم افزار افزود: برخورداری از اندیکاتورها و اسیلاتورها در این نرم افزار هر کاربری را قادر خواهد ساخت تا هر گونه الگوریتم که با سیستم معاملاتی کاربر سازگار است را با ترکیب ابزارهای موجود و در زمان های مختلف نوشته شود. 
وی تصریح کرد: ارزیابی جریان های نقینگی هوشمند در انواع سهام و بهینه سازی سیتم معاملاتی در کنار طراحی الگوریتم های نامحدود، کاهش هزینه زمانی و ارزیابی وضعیت سهام همه شرکت ها از جمله ویژگی های این نرم افزار دانش بنیان برای رصد چرخش نقدینگی در بازار سهام کشور است. منبع: ایسنا

thread.title_full: Ηράκλειο: 2 άτομα συνελήφθησαν για κατοχή και διακίνηση ναρκωτικών

posts.author: Tsantiri News
posts.title: Ηράκλειο: 2 άτομα συνελήφθησαν για κατοχή και διακίνηση ναρκωτικών
posts.text:
Ηράκλειο: 2 άτομα συνελήφθησαν για κατοχή και διακίνηση ναρκωτικών 11:38 - 7 Νοέ 2017 - ΕΛΛΑΔΑ 
Στη σύλληψη δύο ατόμων για κατοχή και διακίνηση ναρκωτικών προχώρησαν οι αστυνομικές αρχές στο Ηράκλειο. 
Πρόκειται για ένα 56χρονο Έλληνα και ένα 34χρονο Αλβανό που, όπως ανακοίνωσε η ΕΛΑΣ, φέρονται ότι κατείχαν και διακινούσαν μεγάλες ποσότητες ναρκωτικών. 
Αστυνομικοί ύστερα από έρευνες στα σπίτια των δυο συλληφθέντων βρήκαν και κατάσχεσαν, μεταξύ άλλων: Ποσότητα ηρωίνης σε μορφή βράχου και σε σκόνη συνολικού μεικτού βάρους 3,032 γραμμαρίων, 84 γραμμάρια κοκαΐνης, 450 ναρκωτικά δισκία χωρίς ιατρική συνταγή, καθώς και σύνεργα κονιορτοποίησης και ανάμειξης ηρωίνης και κοκαΐνης. 
Οι συλληφθέντες με την σε βάρος τους σχηματισθείσα δικογραφία θα οδηγηθούν στον εισαγγελέα Πλημμελειοδικών Ηρακλείου. 
ΠΗΓΗ: ΑΠΕ-ΜΠΕ

thread.title: Gelato days - when the Maestri Gelatieri came to town
thread.title_full: Gelato days - when the Maestri Gelatieri came to town

posts.author: Bridget Blair (noreply@blogger.com)
posts.title: Gelato days - when the Maestri Gelatieri came to town
posts.text:
It may be Autumn, but last weekend I was taken back to Italian summer evenings on the shores of Lake Garda, to afternoons of stifling heat in Florence, and stolen moments outside Leicester Cathedral on warm, sunny lunch breaks.

So what's brought on these memories, I hear you ask. Well, it's the taste of gelato. Not just any gelato, though. I'm talking about the creamy, silky texture, the richness, and the sheer genius of the marriage of flavours which tickle your tongue, slide down your throat, and leave you with a smile on your face. 

I've eaten a lot of artisan gelato recently.

We're lucky in Leicester to have Gelato Village, an artisan gelato shop at an oh so handy location just around the corner from where I work. I'm very partial to flavours such as mango, pistachio and lemon and there are many others of course. At the end of October though, a team of ten Maestri Gelatieri came to town from Italy to share their passion and skills .

They were from all over Italy - some of the world's best gelato makers. Seven men and three women, most of whom had successful careers elsewhere before finding what they really wanted to do, which was to make gelato, in the traditional way, with their own hands and producing their own flavours. Now they were over here to share their favourite flavours and new sensations at Gelato Village..

"Come for  a meal" Laura Hadland from Thirst Media had said...."come and meet them all." So I did, over at Sapori in Anstey, a wonderful Italian restaurant which just happened to be Claudio Ranieri's favourite place when he was managing Leicester City Football Club. (I must just say I adored him- what a character, what a manager and oh how many mourned his departure.)

I digress, back to last Friday, and a noisy night with lots of feverish chat about food, wine, and yes, gelato in Italian, English and sign language.  Delicious Italian food too, for me a wild mushroom and goats cheese tartlet with cashew pesto, Italian fennel sausages and rigatoni followed by a sorrento lemon tart with a orange and carrot sorbet. Perfect.



Everyone was looking forward to their weekend organised by Antonio de Vecchi  and Daniele Taverna from Gelato Village and the Compagnia Gelatieri.



left to right Andrea Scarpati the owner of Sapori,  Raffaella Garavelli , Daniele Taverna and Antonio De Vecchi

They had all brought ingredients from their home regions, from Piedmont, the Marche, Milan, Lombardy and Perugia, to use with the non homogenised milk and cream from Red Poll rare breed cattle on the Belvoir Ridge Creamery farm in Leicestershire.

As soon as they arrived from Italy, they began to make, mix, create the most amazing selection of gelato flavours....







There were some big flavours which screamed "Eat me!" From the deeply rich Chocolate & Tuscan Cigar sorbetto to the subtle fig, almond and bay gelato, the stunningly refreshing and tangy quince and Franciacorta sparkling wine sorbetto and the Passito sweet white wine gelato.

Andrea Soban with his Biscotti Zaeti gelato...he studied law before becoming a gelato maker.



Yes, they were here to make, showcase and sell their creations but there were tastings and talks too, about the history of gelato and how they found their inspiration . According to Antonio Luzi pictured below, the gelato business in Italy is a very saturated market.


It was a busy weekend for all of the gelato makers. Some managed to get out to the Belvoir Ridge Creamery to see where the milk came from to make their gelato and that's what they were all very impressed with, the richness and quality of the milk.

Of course they went to Leicester Cathedral to see the tomb of  Richard III, but there wasn't time for them to really explore the city. There was just enough time for me to take Vera Castrovilli, Alessia Torselli and Raffaella Garavelli next door to one of my favourite places in Leicester, The Guildhall which they loved.



Vera and Alessia were both set designers in films and on stage, before fleeing their stressed careers, and Rafaella was in the corporate world flying all over Europe before returning to her home village and opening a gelateria.

Making gelato has made all three of them very happy.

I'm just as happy eating it, and really enjoyed tasting so many new flavours the weekend the Maestri Gelatieri came to town.. I do hope they come back one day 

Just to make your mouths water , here's the full list of the gelato and sorbetto flavours created for the  trip to Leicester

Paolo Brunelli made Crema Brunelli gelato with hazelnut & chocolate, and Ricotta Celeste a Pois gelato, flavoured with honey, coffee & lemon zest 
From Matteo Carloni, there was Bacio gelato with hazelnut biscuits sandwiched with dark chocolate, and Malaga, a gelato made with a raisin & sweet wine custard 
Vera Castrovilli & Alessia Torselli created Passito Erbaluce di Caluso, a gelato with sweet white wine 
Raffaele Del Verme made a fig and chocolate gelato and a fig with almond and bay gelato   
Raffaella Garavelli created a quince with Franciacorta sparkling wine sorbetto 
From Antonio Luzi, there was a coffee gelato plus a spiced pear sorbetto 
Andrea Soban made a Biscotto Zaeti gelato and Torrone, an Italian hazelnut nougat gelato.

Last but not least, Mirko Tognetti created a chocolate and tuscan cigar sorbetto and a Torta della Nonna gelato flavoured with pine nuts and cream.

thread.title: French power grid operator RTE expects winter demand to be stable
thread.title_full: French power grid operator RTE expects winter demand to be stable | Reuters

posts.author: Reuters Editorial
posts.title: French power grid operator RTE expects winter demand to be stable
posts.text:
PARIS (Reuters) - French electricity demand this winter is expected to be stable, although unplanned nuclear reactor outages and a prolonged cold spell could lead to a tense supply situation, electricity grid operator RTE said in its outlook on Tuesday.
High voltage power line pylons are seen near Aix en Provence, France, February 16, 2017. REUTERS/Jean-Paul Pelissier RTE said it was keeping a watchful eye on the situation, particularly on several nuclear reactors operated by utility EDF that are currently offline, but which are expected to resume production by the end of November.
“With the shutdown of some fuel-powered generators in 2017 and 2018, the electricity system is adjusted to French demand,” the RTE said in a statement.
In case of a cold spell and nuclear outages, the RTE could be forced to gradually use some of its exceptional measures to guarantee security of supply, it added.
Reporting by Bate Felix; Editing by Sudip Kar-Gupta

thread.title: Julianna Margulies had a "horrific" encounter with an armed Steven Seagal in his hotel room - 07-Nov-2017 - NZ Entertainment news
thread.title_full: Julianna Margulies had a "horrific" encounter with an armed Steven Seagal in his hotel room - 07-Nov-2017 - NZ Entertainment news

posts.title: Julianna Margulies had a "horrific" encounter with an armed Steven Seagal in his hotel room - 07-Nov-2017 - NZ Entertainment news
posts.text: Home > News > Entertainment Julianna Margulies had a "horrific" encounter with an armed Steven Seagal in his hotel room The 'Good Wife' actress - who starred with the veteran actor in 1991 film 'Out for Justice' - had been reassured by a female casting director that she wouldn't have to be alone with the 65-year-old star, so she was disturbed to find them the only people in the room when she arrived. 7 November 2017 The 51-year-old star claimed: "When I was 23, a casting director, a woman, said, 'Steven Seagal wants to go over the scene with you in his hotel room at 10 o'clock at night.'"I lived in Brooklyn, and I said, 'Oh, I don't do that. I don't travel. I don't have money for a cab.' And I didn't. And I said, 'And I don't take subways late at night.' And she says, 'Don't worry we'll reimburse you. And I'm here, a woman.'"I got to the hotel at 10:40, and she wasn't there. And he was. Alone. And he made sure that I saw his gun, which I had never seen a gun in real life. And I got out of there unscathed."Julianna learned from the experience so when a female assistant of Harvey Weinstein asked her to meet with the producer in his hotel room to discuss a recent audition, she refused.She said: "I have my own Harvey story, but I never was raped. And I never was harmed. And I don't know how I got out of that hotel room. It always starts with, 'I'm a healer, I want to massage you' and all. I sorta screamed my way out...But, the point is that for years, years, we all just shrug it off..."And because of my experience with Steven Seagal in that room, which was horrific, I refused to meet Harvey Weinstein in his hotel room when another woman brought me, saying 'You will absolutely get [a screen test].' ... [The assistant] said 'I'm going to drop you off at the Peninsula,' and I said, 'I'm not going up there alone.' I saw how she started to sweat. She was like, 'Don't be silly, I'm just going to drop you off. It's going to be fine.' And I said, 'Nope, then I'm going home.' "According to the former 'E.R.' star, when she and the assistant arrived at the room, Weinstein - who has been accused of sexual misconduct by dozens of women - was wearing a bathrobe and a candlelit dinner for two was set up.She continued on SiriusXM's 'Just Jenny': "I saw him stare at her, daggers. And I turned to see what she had done to deserve that, and I caught her in a shrug, like 'What could I do?'"He looked at me, furious, and he took the door and he said, 'Just wanted to say great audition.' And he slammed the door. Of course I didn't get the part."Julianna felt "set up" by the women.She added: "It's not always the men that are awful...We have to start holding these people accountable."A spokesperson for Seagal hasn't commented on the claims. © 2017 Bang Showbiz, NZCity Other Entertainment News

thread.title: '수녀 유치원장' 두달치 CCTV… 하루 24번 때리기도
thread.title_full: '수녀 유치원장' 두달치 CCTV… 하루 24번 때리기도 : 네이버 블로그

posts.author: dong1234r
posts.title: '수녀 유치원장' 두달치 CCTV… 하루 24번 때리기도
posts.text:
[경찰, '기소의견' 검찰 송치… 64일치 CCTV 분석하자 총 10일 폭력, 하루 24회도]
올해 8월 28일 충북 영동군에 위치한 가톨릭 성당 운영 유치원 원장이자 수녀인 A씨가 3살 어린이를 폭행하는 장면 /사진=피해자 측 제공
<이미지를 클릭하시면 크게 보실 수 있습니다>
3살 아이 폭행으로 논란이 됐던 충북 영동의 수녀 유치원장이 상습적 아동 학대를 저지른 것으로 조사됐다. 우발적이었다는 기존 해명과 달리 많게는 하루 24번까지 아이를 때렸다고 경찰이 확인했다.
(☞본지 8월30일 보도 [단독]'수녀님'이 3살 아이 폭행…경찰 조사 중 참고)
충북 영동경찰서는 영동군 면 소재지의 가톨릭 성당에서 운영하는 유치원 원장이자 수녀인 A씨(44)를 아동복지법 위반 등의 혐의로 지난달 27일 검찰에 기소의견으로 송치했다고 7일 밝혔다.
앞서 A씨는 올해 8월 28일 유치원 복도에서 원생 B군(3)을 집어 들어 땅에 내던지고, 손으로 얼굴을 때려 경찰에 입건됐다.
B군 부모의 신고로 수사를 시작한 경찰은 해당 유치원의 64일치 폐쇄회로화면(CCTV)을 복원해 조사했다. CCTV 분석 결과 A씨는 총 64일 가운데 10일간 B군에 신체적 폭력을 가한 것으로 나타났다.
경찰에 따르면 A씨는 하루에 적게는 2번에서 많게는 24번까지 B군을 때렸다. B군이 24차례 폭행을 당한 날은 부모가 처음으로 학대를 인지한 8월 28일 당일이었다.
당시 유치원 측에서는 사건이 우발적으로 발생했다고 해명했지만, 경찰의 CCTV 분석 결과 상습적인 폭행으로 확인됐다.
A씨의 학대에 시달린 아이는 B군 말고도 또 있었다. 경찰은 CCTV 분석으로 2명의 추가 피해아동을 확인했다. 2명의 피해아동 역시 A씨에게 상습 폭행을 당했다.
B군의 아버지는 "차라리 (맞은 영상을) 안 보는 것이 마음이 나을 뻔했다"고 말했다.
B군의 가족은 확인되지 않은 소문으로 마음고생을 겪기도 했다. 일부 가톨릭 커뮤니티에서는 "언론에 공개된 영상이 8배속으로 빨리 감겨 폭행한 것처럼 보이는 것", "경찰이 폭행 증거를 찾지 못했다" 등의 글이 올라와 A씨의 무죄를 주장하기도 했다.
A씨는 경찰 조사에서 B군 상습 폭행 등을 시인했다. 경찰 관계자는 "A씨가 CCTV 동영상을 보고 모든 혐의를 인정했다"고 말했다.
한편 해당 유치원은 논란이 불거진 탓에 현재 문을 닫은 상태다.

thread.title: Papua New Guinea court rejects application to restore services to Manus detention centre - 07-Nov-2017 - NZ International news
thread.title_full: Papua New Guinea court rejects application to restore services to Manus detention centre - 07-Nov-2017 - NZ International news

posts.title: Papua New Guinea court rejects application to restore services to Manus detention centre - 07-Nov-2017 - NZ International news
posts.text:
Home > News > International Papua New Guinea court rejects application to restore services to Manus detention centre The Supreme Court rules there is "no real good reason" why the men in the Manus Island detention centre should not voluntarily move to the three alternative accommodation sites. 7 November 2017 
Papua New Guinea's Supreme Court has rejected an application to restore basic services to the Manus Island detention centre. 
The centre closed permanently a week ago , with 600 men who had been refusing to leave told to leave the premises. 
One of the refugees still at the centre, Behrouz Boochani, had sought an injunction ordering the restoration of power, water and food supplies after they were cut off. 
But the court rejected the application saying there was "no real good reason" why the men should not voluntarily move to the three alternative accommodation sites on offer in the main town of Lorengau. 
Chief Justice Sir Salamo Injia said he was satisfied the services provided at the alternative accommodation were "of good standard" and allowed for the free movement of the men. 
Mr Boochani's lawyer Ben Lomai said that meant it was PNG's responsibility, not Australia's, to resettle refugees. 
"Which means if they want to deal directly with a third country, they can do that," he said. 
Mr Boochani tweeted in response to the court's ruling: "It means the gov can kill us by depriving us of access to food. We are outside of any law." 
The PNG Government had been urging the men to leave, however, the centre's residents said they feared for their safety. 
The closure was announced after a PNG court ruled the detention facility was unconstitutional. 
The UN human rights office had called for food, water and health services to be restored to end the "unfolding humanitarian emergency" . 
Shortly after the court decision came down, protesters from the Activists & Citizens Alliance unveiled a banner on a crane at the Melbourne Cup reading "SOS: Evacuate Manus Now" . 
There were also major delays on the Flemington Racecourse train line after another protester from the group parked a car across the tracks. 'Activists in Australia' encouraging men to stay in centre: PM 
Prime Minister Malcolm Turnbull earlier told the ABC the new facilities were of "very high quality" and the men should relocate. 
"I think the responsible course of action is to encourage them to comply with the lawful requests and requirements of the PNG authorities," he said. 
He said the men who have refused to leave the centre were being encouraged by "some activists in Australia, including the Greens senator Nick McKim". 
"Everything the Greens and people on the left of the Labor Party say about this is used as marketing by the people smugglers," he said. 
"I mean they are the worst criminals. And what they do is, they're saying to these people: 'Don't budge, don't budge. Get lots of pictures on the Australian news, the ABC is giving it a big run.' 
"They'll say: 'It's getting a big run in the Australian media and before too long the Australian Government will weaken and allow you to come to Australia.' And that will then be the big opportunity, the marketing opportunity for the people smugglers." 
The Federal Government has been under growing international pressure to resolve the stand-off with the men. 
On Sunday the Prime Minister rejected an offer from his New Zealand counterpart Jacinda Ardern to resettle 150 asylum seekers from Manus Island and Nauru. 
"The offer has been restated, we thank New Zealand for making that offer, we are not taking it up at this time," Mr Turnbull said. 
But Mr Turnbull did not rule out accepting Ms Ardern's offer at a later stage.

thread.title: ΚΕΕΛΠΝΟ: 12.000 εμβόλια για την ιλαρά - Οι βασικές αιτίες της επιδημικής έξαρσης
thread.title_full: ΚΕΕΛΠΝΟ: 12.000 εμβόλια για την ιλαρά - Οι βασικές αιτίες της επιδημικής έξαρσης

posts.title: ΚΕΕΛΠΝΟ: 12.000 εμβόλια για την ιλαρά - Οι βασικές αιτίες της επιδημικής έξαρσης
posts.text: ΚΕΕΛΠΝΟ: 12.000 εμβόλια για την ιλαρά - Οι βασικές αιτίες της επιδημικής έξαρσης 7/11/2017 11:30:00 πμ | Facebook (0) (0) Η χαμηλή εμβολιαστική κάλυψη, ειδικά σε κοινωνικά αποκλεισμένες ομάδες, αλλά και η γενικευμένη επιδημία στην Ευρώπη και πιο συγκεκριμένα σε κοντινές μας χώρες όπως η Ιταλία και η Ρουμανία, είναι οι βασικές αιτίες της επιδημικής έξαρσης της ιλαράς που παρατηρείται φέτος στη χώρα μας. Τα παραπάνω τονίζει ο αντιπρόεδρος του Κέντρου Ελέγχου και Πρόληψης Νοσημάτων. Ο Αγάπιος Τερζίδης εκτιμά ωστόσο, ότι εξαιτίας της έγκαιρης προετοιμασίας δεν θα έχουμε την έξαρση που παρατηρείται σε άλλες ευρωπαϊκές χώρες, όπως στη Ρουμανία, όπου έχουν καταγραφεί περίπου 10.000 κρούσματα, και απ’ ό,τι «φαίνεται θα κρατηθεί χαμηλά», λέει χαρακτηριστικά.«Η επιδημική έξαρση δεν μας βρήκε απροετοίμαστους είχαμε ήδη προμηθευθεί περίπου 50.000 εμβόλια και ξεκίνησε η υλοποίηση σχεδίου εμβολιασμών», αναφέρει ο ίδιος στο Αθηναϊκό Πρακτορείο. Με την έναρξη της επιδημίας στις κοντινές χώρες το ΚΕΕΛΠΝΟ άρχισε εκστρατεία ενημέρωσης και ευαισθητοποίησης του πληθυσμού με αφίσες, διαφημιστικά μηνύματα, αλλά και δράσεις για τον εμβολιασμό των κοινωνικά αποκλεισμένων-ευάλωτων ομάδων όπως είναι οι Ρομά, οι μετανάστες και οι πρόσφυγες. Από τον περασμένο Ιούνιο, υπογραμμίζει, έχουν γίνει 12.000 δόσεις και συνεχίζουμε με τελικό στόχο τα 25.000 εμβόλια έως το τέλος του χρόνου. Σύμφωνα με τα στοιχεία του Κέντρου, σε πολλές ευρωπαϊκές χώρες έχει εκδηλωθεί επιδημία ιλαράς που βρίσκεται σε εξέλιξη. Κατά την περίοδο 2016-2017 έχουν καταγραφεί περισσότερα από 19.000 περιστατικά σε όλη την Ευρώπη και 44 θάνατοι. Στην Ελλάδα καταγράφηκε ένας θάνατος και 368 κρούσματα ιλαράς. Οι δράσεις για τον εμβολιασμό είχαν ατονήσει Ο κ. Τερζίδης αναφέρει ότι οι δράσεις για τον εμβολιασμό των κοινωνικά αποκλεισμένων ομάδων «είχαν ατονήσει και παραμεληθεί» κατά τα προηγούμενα χρόνια. Την τελευταία διετία, συνεχίζει, γίνεται μία ουσιαστική προσπάθεια αναβάθμισης της δημόσιας υγείας με τις δράσεις και πρωτοβουλίες του υπουργείου Υγείας.«Χρειάζονται δράσεις ενημέρωσης οι οποίες θα στοχεύουν στο γενικό πληθυσμό, τις ειδικές -ευάλωτες- ομάδες, τους επαγγελματίες υγείας, αλλά και στους οπαδούς του αντιεμβολιαστικού κινήματος, οι οποίοι κατά τη γνώμη μου είναι η πιο επικίνδυνη και δύσκολη ομάδα στόχος», λέει ο αντιπρόεδρος του ΚΕΕΛΠΝΟ, , κάνοντας λόγο για «υπεροπτική στάση» αν σκεφτούμε ότι στην Αφρική 500.000 παιδιά πεθαίνουν από επιπλοκές της ιλαράς. Προσθέτει ότι από τον Μάιο του 2016, σε συνεργασία με τις Μη Κυβερνητικές Οργανώσεις, έχει ξεκινήσει εμβολιασμός όλων των παιδιών προσφύγων-μεταναστών με τα εμβόλια προτεραιότητας: Ιλαράς, ερυθράς, παρωτίτιδας, διφθερίτιδας, τετάνου, κοκίτη, πολιομυελίτιδας, αιμόφιλου, της ινφλουέντσας, ηπατίτιδας Β και πνευμονιόκοκκου. Σημειώνεται ότι δεν έχει καταγραφεί κρούσμα ιλαράς σε πρόσφυγες-μετανάστες. Γίνονται επαναληπτικές δόσεις, δίνοντας προτεραιότητα στα παιδιά που ξεκινούν να παρακολουθούν το σχολείο. Οι εμβολιασμοί γίνονται σε όλους τους χώρους διαβίωσης μεταναστών -προσφύγων σε συνεργασία με τις ΜΚΟ, που δραστηριοποιούνται στο πεδίο. Τον γενικό συντονισμό και σχεδιασμό, καθώς και την τήρηση του αρχείου των εμβολιασμών έχει η Γενική Γραμματείας Δημόσιας Υγείας και το ΚΕΕΛΠΝΟ. Την ευθύνη για τη φύλαξη και τη διάθεση των εμβολίων καθώς και για τη χορήγηση του βιβλιαρίου υγείας έχει το Κέντρο καταλήγει ο ίδιος. ΠΗΓΗ: ΑΠΕ-ΜΠΕ

thread.title: Το φραουλόσπιτο, η κονσόλα της Nintedo -Πόσο αξίζουν σήμερα τα παιχνίδια της δεκαετίας του '80 [εικόνες]
thread.title_full: Το φραουλόσπιτο, η κονσόλα της Nintedo -Πόσο αξίζουν σήμερα τα παιχνίδια της δεκαετίας του '80 [εικόνες]

posts.author: Tsantiri News
posts.title: Το φραουλόσπιτο, η κονσόλα της Nintedo -Πόσο αξίζουν σήμερα τα παιχνίδια της δεκαετίας του '80 [εικόνες]
posts.text:
Το φραουλόσπιτο, η κονσόλα της Nintedo -Πόσο αξίζουν σήμερα τα παιχνίδια της δεκαετίας του '80 [εικόνες] 11:29 - 7 Νοέ 2017 - SHOWBIZ 
Αν είσαι από τα άτομα που δεν πετούν τίποτα, ακόμη και τα παιχνίδια με τα οποία έπαιζαν όταν ήταν μικροί, τότε σίγουρα θα ενθουσιαστείς όταν μάθεις πως πλέον κοστίζουν πολλά περισσότερα από την αρχική τους τιμή. 
Όσοι, λοιπόν, είχαν αποκτήσει στα ‘80s μερικά από τα πιο γνωστά παιχνίδια που έκαναν θραύση τότε, τώρα μπορούν να πουλήσουν στο διαδίκτυο εισπράττοντας από 200 δολάρια μέχρι και 1.000. 
Ποια είναι όμως τα παιχνίδια που αγαπούν οι συλλέκτες και δίνουν ένα αρκετά μεγάλο ποσό για να τα αποκτήσουν; 
Οι φιγούρες She-Ra και Swift Wind Action Figurines κυκλοφόρησαν το 1985 και τότε κόστιζαν 15 δολάρια. Σήμερα μπορεί κάποιος να το πουλήσει μέχρι και 200 δολ. 
Το φραουλόσπιτο έγινε από τα πιο περιζήτητα κουκλόσπιτα το ‘80s με χιλιάδες γονείς να δίνουν 30 δολάρια για να αποκτήσουν το σπιτάκι με τα 6 δωμάτια. Σήμερα, από την πώληση αυτού μπορεί κάποιος να βγει κερδισμένος κατά 150 δολάρια. 
Αυτό το ανδρικό όχημα με βάση για ελικόπτερο και όνομα Joe General εξαφανίστηκε από τις αγορές περίπου το 1992. Σήμερα η τιμή που μπορεί να πιάσει είναι ακόμη και 600 δολάρια. 
Δεν υπάρχει συλλέκτης παιχνιδιών που να μην θέλει να αποκτήσει το πρώτο Nintendo, το οποίο κυκλοφόρησε το 1985. Η πρώτη συσκευή- κονσόλα είχε γίνει ανάρπαστη τότε, ενώ τώρα στα μάτια των περισσότερων δεν θυμίζει τίποτα με τις συσκευές του σήμερα. Έτσι αν καποιος το έχει ακόμη στην κατοχή του μπορεί να κερδίσει ακόμη και 1.000 δολάρια. 
Η πρώτη φιγούρα του Thunder Wings Lion- O μπορεί τότε να κόστιζε μόνο 30 δολάρια, αλλά μετά την επιτυχία που γνώρισε το κινούμενο σχέδιο, σήμερα μπορεί κάποιος να πουλήσει αυτή την φιγούρα έναντι 350 δολαρίων. 
Ο αρκουδος Ραξπιν ήταν ο πρώτος που μπορούσε να βγάλει ήχους. Βάζοντας μία κασέτα στην πλάτη του, το παιχνίδι είχε γίνει τόσο ανάρπαστο τότε που κόστιζε 100 δολάρια. Σήμερα η τιμή του είναι γύρω στα 600. 
Αυτές οι 4 φιγούρες των Real Ghostbusters ήταν τόσο δημοφιλείς τότε που σήμερα μπορεί να τις πουλήσει κάποιος και τις 4 στην τιμή των 1.000 δολαρίων.

0 Kurczak w sosie pomarańczowym 
Danie typu stir-fry popularne w kuchni chińskiej. Panierowane w jajku i mące ziemniaczanej kawałki filetów kurczaka szybko podsmażane z imbirem i czosnkiem a następnie krótko gotowane w słodko-kwaśnym sosie pomarańczowym. Całość podawana jest z ryżem i brokułami oraz posypana sezmem i drobno posiekaną papryczką chili. Kurczak przygotowany w ten sposób jest wyjątkowo miękki i soczysty! Dla najlepszego efektu do dania polecam użyć świeżo wyciśniętego soku z pomarańczy :-)

thread.title: “Mereka Di Dataran Merdeka… Adakah Banjir Di Dataran Merdeka?” – Shahrizat
thread.title_full: “Mereka Di Dataran Merdeka… Adakah Banjir Di Dataran Merdeka?” – Shahrizat

posts.author: fotoslider
posts.title: “Mereka Di Dataran Merdeka… Adakah Banjir Di Dataran Merdeka?” – Shahrizat
posts.text:
TARIKH Tuesday, 7 November 2017 MASA 5 Jam Lalu 
KUALA LUMPUR, 7 Nov – Ketua Pergerakan Wanita UMNO, Tan Sri Shahrizat Abd Jalil membidas sikap Ahli Parlimen Permatang Pauh, Datin Seri Dr Wan Azizah Wan Ismail bersama `konco-konco’nya kerana lebih rela membiarkan rakyat di Pulau Pinang termasuk di Permatang Pauh separuh tenggelam sedangkan mereka masih boleh menganjurkan program politik di Dataran Merdeka. 

“Tindakan ini jelas membuktikan bahawa mereka lebih mengutamakan politik peribadi, bukannya politik untuk membantu rakyat walhal rakyat di Pulau Pinang terkapai-kapai kerana bencana banjir terburuk di sana. 
“Saya memantau keadaan di sana, sedih melihat keadaan rakyat di sana, tidak kiralah warna kulit atau ‘baju politik’ mereka tetapi akhirnya siapa yang turun membantu mangsa banjir di sana,” ujarnya mengulas penglibatan Dr Wan Azizah dalam perarakan 1,000 hari Datuk Seri Anwar Ibrahim Dipenjara. 
Katanya, beliau kesal dengan cara Dr Wan Azizah yang secara jelas agendanya bersama anggota pembangkang adalah perjuangan individu dan untuk diri mereka sendiri. 
“Perjuangan untuk rakyat hanyalah perjuangan sampingan buat mereka sedangkan sepatutnya mereka kerahkan kepimpinan dan ahli mereka untuk turun bantu mangsa banjir di sana, termasuk di Permatang Pauh sendiri. 
“Hari ini, Perdana Menteri pun dah turun, Timbalan Perdana Menteri dah turun semenjak banjir melanda Pulau Pinang, jentera UMNO dan Barisan Nasional (BN) khususnya Skuad Sayang sejak hari pertama dah turun untuk membantu, tapi di mana PKR, Dap? Di mana Dr Wan Azizah, Nurul Izzah? Mereka ada di Dataran Merdeka, adakah ada banjir di Dataran Merdeka tu…..?,” soalnya sinis kepada UMNO-Online. 
Semalam, ketika rakyat Pulau Pinang masih bergelut dalam bencana banjir, pemimpin Pakatan Harapan termasuklah Dr Wan Azizah yang merupakan Ahli Parlimen Permatang Pauh telah menganjurkan konvoi berjalan kaki dari pekarangan Parlimen ke Dataran Merdeka sempena 1,000 hari memperingati Datuk Seri Anwar Ibrahim dikenakan hukuman penjara. 
Antara pemimpin Pakatan Harapan yang terlibat dalam perarakan tersebut ialah Naib Presiden PKR Tian Chua, R Sivarasa, Nurul Izzah; Ahli Parlimen Pokok Sena Datuk Mahfuz Omar dan Ahli Parlimen Shah Alam Khalid Samad. – MediaUMNO Berita Berkaitan

thread.title: Златото връща част от блясъка си
thread.title_full: Златото връща част от блясъка си

posts.author: Lora Markova (noreply@blogger.com)
posts.title: Златото връща част от блясъка си
posts.text:
Златото се върна над 1 270 долара за унция вчера, след стабилизиране в долара и понижението в лихвените нива. Това доведе до възстановяване на интереса към благородния метал, след трета поредна седмица на спад. 
Цената обаче, продължава да е под натиска на очакванията за ново повишение на лихвите от страна на Фед през следващия месец. Спот цената на златото, се търгуваше рано тази сутрин при нива от 1 278 долара за унция, докато фючърсите на метала с доставка през декември, се повишиха до нива от около 1 280 долара за унция. Доларът се стабилизар в понеделник, след най-голямото му седмично поскъпване тази година, докато лихвите по двугодишните немски облигации са близо до вдумесечния си минимум. До най-ниските си нива от две седмици насам, се понижиха и лихвите по 10-годишните щатски облигации. „Златото продължава да е заклещено в диапазона между 1 263 и 1 282 долара, като ниските лихвени нива се неутрализират от по-силния долар“, според Оле Хансен, ръководител на звеното за търговия със суровини на Saxo Bank. Факта, че Тръмп е на посещение в Азия, може да възобнови акцента към Северна Корея, което да окаже подкрепа за цената на благородния метал, според пазарни наблюдатели. Златото поевтиня през последните седмици, като върна с 2.5% от пика си в средата на октомври, с нарастване на очакванията за още едно повишение на лихвите през декември, от страна на Фед. В същото време, изнесени данни посочиха спад в запасите на най-големия индексен фонд, базиран на цената на златото с пет тона през изминалата седмица. Или инвеститорите продължават да излизат от златото. Нетните дълги позиции на спекулантите се понижиха с 2 400 контракта до 166 000 контракта за седмицата до 31 октомври.

thread.title: Πρωτοπορία για το βρετανικό σύστημα Υγείας: Σε 24ωρη βάση συμβουλές από γιατρό μέσω smarthpone!
thread.title_full: Πρωτοπορία για το βρετανικό σύστημα Υγείας: Σε 24ωρη βάση συμβουλές από γιατρό μέσω smarthpone!

posts.title: Πρωτοπορία για το βρετανικό σύστημα Υγείας: Σε 24ωρη βάση συμβουλές από γιατρό μέσω smarthpone!
posts.text: Πρωτοπορία για το βρετανικό σύστημα Υγείας: Σε 24ωρη βάση συμβουλές από γιατρό μέσω smarthpone! 7/11/2017 11:18:30 πμ | Facebook (0) (1) Εκατομμύρια ασφαλισμένοι του Εθνικού Συστήματος Υγείας της Βρετανίας θα έχουν πλέον τη δυνατότητα να συμβουλεύονται οικογενειακό γιατρό επί 24ώρου βάσεως όχι δια ζώσης, αλλά δια μέσου «έξυπνου» κινητού τηλεφώνου. Οι συμβουλές θα δίνονται μέσω βιντεο-συνομιλίας από ειδική εφαρμογή του smartphone. Είχε προηγηθεί η πιλοτική εφαρμογή του μέτρου σε 3.000 ασθενείς, η οποία κρίθηκε επιτυχής και τώρα επεκτείνεται στο σύστημα υγείας της χώρας. Η πρωτοβουλία έχει συναντήσει και αντιδράσεις, καθώς έχουν εκφρασθεί ανησυχίες ότι θα δημιουργηθεί ένα εθνικό σύστημα υγείας δύο ταχυτήτων (οι νεότεροι θα χρησιμοποιούν τη νέα τεχνολογία και μόνο οι ηλικιωμένοι και οι ψυχικά πάσχοντες τις παραδοσιακές ιατρικές υπηρεσίες), καθώς επίσης ότι θα διαρραγούν οι διαπροσωπικές σχέσεις ανάμεσα στους γιατρούς και στους ασθενείς. Όμως, παρά τους φόβους, η διοίκηση του Εθνικού Συστήματος Υγείας (NHS), σύμφωνα με τους «Τάιμς του Λονδίνου», αποφάσισε να προχωρήσει την καινοτομία, με το σκεπτικό ότι «ένα μέγεθος δεν ταιριάζει για όλους» και ότι οι δημόσιες υπηρεσίες υγείας δεν είναι δυνατό να παρέχονται αιωνίως με τον παλαιομοδίτικο τρόπο, συνεπώς θα πρέπει να προσαρμοσθούν στην ψηφιακή εποχή. Η νέα υπηρεσία "GP at Hand" (Ο γενικός γιατρός κοντά σας), που υλοποιείται σε συνεργασία με την εταιρεία Babylon, υπόσχεται ότι κάποιος γιατρός θα επικοινωνεί με τον ασθενή το πολύ εντός διώρου από τη στιγμή που ο ασθενής θα υποβάλει το σχετικό αίτημα μέσω του κινητού τηλεφώνου του. Αν ο ασθενής χρειάζεται μια επαφή με το γιατρό πρόσωπο-με-πρόσωπο, θα κλείνεται δεύτερο «ζωντανό» πλέον ραντεβού σε κάποια κλινική. Σύμφωνα με τις εκτιμήσεις, αυτές οι περιπτώσεις που καθιστούν αναγκαία τη φυσική παρουσία του γιατρού, δεν ξεπερνούν το 20%. Ήδη η νέα υπηρεσία συνδυάζεται με ένα σύστημα τεχνητής νοημοσύνης που βοηθά τους γιατρούς να κάνουν αυτόματες διαγνώσεις με βάση τα συμπτώματα κάθε ασθενούς. Σύμφωνα με τη Babylon, το 40% των αιτημάτων των ασθενών μπορούν ουσιαστικά να διαγνωσθούν από τον «ψηφιακό» γιατρό. Κάθε ασφαλισμένος που έχει δηλώσει ότι θα χρησιμοποιεί τη νέα online υπηρεσία, θα καταβάλει ποσό 50 λιρών ετησίως, ενώ κάθε γιατρός θα πληρώνεται κατά μέσο όρο με περίπου 150 λίρες ετησίως για κάθε καταχωρημένο ασθενή-χρήστη του "GP at Hand" για τον οποίο θα είναι υπεύθυνος. ΠΗΓΗ: ΑΠΕ-ΜΠΕ

posts.title: GHANAIANS WILL DEAL WITH YOU IF YOU DUMP ME - JULIET IBRAHIM WARNS BOYFRIEND
posts.text: Actress Juliet Ibrahim has warned her boyfriend to shield any plans of breaking her heart because Ghanaians won’t forgive him if he does. The actress, who was once married to Kwadwo Sarfo, says Ghanaians will deal with musician Iceberg Slim, born Olusegun Olowokere, if he decides to end their relationship. “Ghanaians you are listening ooo, the whole country is behind me, if you mess up…if you mess up Iceberg Slim…I see the comments from my Ghanaian fans like ‘if you try it, if you mess Juliet up, we will deal with you,’” the mother of one warned. The two lovebirds, who made their relationship public recently, recounted during an interview with Lexis Bill on Drive Time on Joy FM that they met and fell in love when during a trip to South Africa. Their common was music, coupled with the fact that Iceberg Slim is also into music was enough to kick things. Asked what he likes about Juliet Ibrahim, he said, “there is no word in the dictionary to actually explain. It’s just a feeling and it’s a happy feeling.” “She has great heart…she is a very caring person,” Iceberg Slim added. The Nigerian musician is out with a new song, ‘Oluwa’. The lovebirds revealed that, they will be releasing a joint single, ‘Keep Your Head Up’ soon. When asked when they will be walking down aisle, they said “God’s time is the best time.” swdswxxzczq

Millennium Health LLC Junior Account Manager (Sales) Los Angeles in Los Angeles , California 
Junior Account Manager (Sales) Los Angeles 
Tracking Code 
1946 
Job Description 
Millennium Health, based in San Diego, is a leading health solutions company that delivers timely, accurate, clinically actionable information to inform the right treatment decisions for each patient at the right time. 
We are looking to hire a Junior Account Manager to support any and all territories within the region. Your primary responsibility will be to educate, service, and train the existing offices on Millennium’s offerings utilizing company approved resources. Your secondary role will be to identify new business opportunities by developing existing relationships and cold calling prospective accounts. The expectation of the Junior Account Manager is to consistently develop sales competencies which will prepare the Junior Account Manager for career development and promotion potential. This position requires the Junior Account Manager to be available for travel up to 100% of the time at the discretion of the Regional Manager. 
The following are intended to be examples of the accountabilities for which the person in this position is responsible. This position is not intended to be complete or all-inclusive and does not preclude management from assigning other or related functions for which the individual has demonstrated competency through performance. 
Assist in lead generation and prospecting 
Lead generation through referrals and cold calling 
Schedule and/or arrange UPS/FedEx pick-ups from offices 
Responsible for assisting in growth of new and current business 
Schedule and execute in-service training at customer sites 
Train clinic staff in proper processing of requisitions and sample collection procedure 
Provide regular follow up and refresher training to customers as required 
Ensure all customers are adequately stocked with appropriate supplies at all times 
Provide Management with weekly progress reports 
Plan and execute visits to all existing accounts in the territory on a regular basis 
Identify, communicate and help resolve any service issues, billing issues or customer complaints 
Work as a team with the territory sales rep to ensure excellent on-going customer service and satisfaction with company’s products and services 
As required, assist company in obtaining information missing from requisitions in order to facilitate timely specimen processing 
Develop close working relationship and collaborate with Lab staff, especially Billing & Data Entry 
As required, assist Marketing team with customer surveys and feedback to identify areas for service improvements and enhancement 
Adherence to confidentiality (HIPAA) requirements 
Other duties as assigned

Worksafe NZ has been advised of the death of a man at Le Bons Bay in Canterbury, police say. 
The man has been named as Alan John Scott, 70, from Ohoka in Waimakariri District. 
Police and ambulance staff were called to the scene, near Akaroa, about 2.15pm on Monday. 
Police said on Monday that the man had apparently been operating machinery when he died, but the circumstances surrounding the incident were yet to be confirmed.

thread.title: Tre Sull'altalena al Teatro San Carluccio di Napoli
thread.title_full: Tre Sull'altalena al Teatro San Carluccio di Napoli

posts.author: Silvia Arosio (noreply@blogger.com)
posts.title: Tre Sull'altalena al Teatro San Carluccio di Napoli
posts.text:
Da giovedì 9 a domenica 12 novembre (giovedì- venerdì e sabato ore 21:00, domenica ore 18:00), presso il Nuovo Teatro Sancarluccio di Napoli (via San Pasquale a Chiaia,49), si terrà lo spettacolo di Luigi Lunari “Tre sull’altalena” con Stefania Benincaso, Arianna Gaudio, Stefania Aluzzi e Nicola Ciccariello per la regia di Roberto Negri.



Breve sinossi

Tre donne, una giovane imprenditrice, una sergente dell'esercito ed una professoressa si trovano nello stesso luogo per tre ragioni diverse: l’imprenditrice per un incontro galante, la sergente per trattare un acquisto di materiale bellico, la professoressa per ritirare le bozze di stampa di un suo libro. Ma cos'è esattamente quel luogo? Una segreteria politica, un luogo di affari, o una casa editrice? E' possibile che tutte e tre abbiano avuto l'indirizzo sbagliato? Questa situazione strana accresce il mistero, anche perché un allarme per un’esercitazione anti-inquinamento impedisce loro di uscire. Durante la notte che sono costrette a passare insieme, le tre giungono a sospettare che la stanza potrebbe essere davvero un'anticamera per l'aldilà, e che probabilmente esse sono già morte, e in attesa del Giudizio. Reagiscono a questa prospettiva secondo le rispettive caratteristiche psicologiche: l’imprenditrice è spaventata ed ansiosa, la sergente non trova niente di misterioso nella situazione e resta assolutamente indifferente, la professoressa usa tutta sua logica filosofica per spiegare il fenomeno come un fatto naturale e logico. Ne risulta un dialogo umoristico centrato sui temi importanti di vita e morte, destino, predestinazione e libero arbitrio, esistenza di Dio ed ateismo. Improvvisamente un uomo delle pulizie entra nella stanza e dice cose talmente ambigue da far nascere nelle tre malcapitate un nuovo grande enigma: è realmente un uomo delle pulizie, o è l'Angelo del Giudizio? Sul finale quando l’uomo esce, senza svelare il mistero, un lungo suono della sirena indica che l'allarme per l'emergenza inquinamento è finito. Le tre donne sono pronte ad andare, ma la scena finale ci regala un sorprendente coup de théâtre.

NOTE DELL’AUTORE

Tre sull'altalena è la mia commedia più nota e fortunata. Scritta nel 1990, vero e proprio trionfo al Festival di Avignone nel 1994, tradotta in ventotto lingue, correntemente rappresentata in tutto il mondo.

Il cast prevede tre uomini e una donna, oppure quattro uomini. Ma molte volte mi è accaduto di vederla rappresentata con una o più donne in questo o quel personaggio. Da un lato la prova del fascino che essa esercita anche sulle attrici, dall'altro lato un risultato sciagurato: i miei personaggi sono profondamente maschili, e interpretati da donne suonano falsi e fuori luogo. Un proverbio inglese dice "If you can't beat them, join them", che vuol dire - a un dipresso - se non sai liberarti da un guaio, adéguati". Su questa strada mi sono ricordato di quello che ha fatto Neil Simon riscrivendo al femminile "La strana coppia", originariamente pensata per Jack Lemmon e Walter Matthau (che tra l'altro avevo avuto l'occasione di tradurre per Monica Vitti e Rossella Falk). Ho dunque ripensato a "Tre sull'altalena" in chiave femminile, conservando gli snodi comici, ma cambiando le motivazioni, la psicologia, i rapporti reciproci, le interazoni e il linguaggio stesso dei personaggi. 

Mission accomplished? L’ho potuto verificare il 24 febbraio del 2017 a Lucera, dove ha avuto luogo - grazie ad Apulia Arte, Turismo e cultura - la "prima mondiale" di questo mio ultimo lavoro. "Prima mondiale" può suonare un po' enfatico: ma come altrimenti si può definire la prima volta che un testo viene rappresentato al mondo? (Luigi Lunari)

Tre sull’altalena

di Luigi Lunari 

con Stefania Benincaso, Arianna Gaudio, Stefania Aluzzi e Nicola Ciccariello 

regia di Roberto Negri

TEATRO SAN CARLUCCIO 

Via San Pasquale 49 - Napoli

posts.title: Θεσσαλονίκη: Συνελήφθη ζευγάρι με 15,5 κιλά κάνναβης [εικόνα]
posts.text:
Θεσσαλονίκη: Συνελήφθη ζευγάρι με 15,5 κιλά κάνναβης [εικόνα] 11:28 - 7 Νοέ 2017 - ΕΛΛΑΔΑ 
Σε αποθήκη ναρκωτικών είχε μετατρέψει ζευγάρι Ελλήνων υπόγειο διαμέρισμα, κοντά στην Πλατεία Αρχαίας Αγοράς, στο κέντρο της Θεσσαλονίκης. 
Πρόκειται για έναν 49χρονο και την 52χρονη σύντροφό του, οι οποίοι συνελήφθησαν με την κατηγορία της κατοχής και εμπορίας ναρκωτικών. 
Σε έφοδο που πραγματοποίησαν αστυνομικοί της δίωξης ναρκωτικών δυτικής Θεσσαλονίκης στο συγκεκριμένο διαμέρισμα, εντόπισαν 15,5 κιλά ακατέργαστης κάνναβης, συσκευασμένης σε δέματα. 
Η παραπάνω ναρκωτική ουσία εκτιμάται ότι επρόκειτο να διοχετευθεί σε πιάτσες τοξικοεξαρτημένων στο ευρύτερο πολεοδομικό συγκρότημα της Θεσσαλονίκης. 
Εξάλλου, στην κατοχή των συλληφθέντων αλλά και στο σπίτι τους στην ‘Ανω Πόλη, βρέθηκαν μικροποσότητες χασίς και καπνού, όπως επίσης και ναρκωτικά χάπια. 
ΠΗΓΗ: ΑΠΕ-ΜΠΕ

*FULL TIME 3RD SHIFT 3 DAYS A WEEK EVERY 3RD WEEKEND PART TIME WEEKEND WARRIOR 3PM-11:30PM 8 HOUR SHIFT. $5.00 MORE ON THE HOUR plus shift deferential, plus 1.50 weekend pay. 
Position Summary: 
Administers resident care under the supervision of a Registered Nurse and/or a physician to maintain the highest level of resident care. 
Essential Functions: 
Because HCF exists to care for our residents, regular attendance and punctuality are essential to provide quality care Must be in good physical condition as the position requires the ability to stand on one’s feet throughout the day, as well as, push, pull, move and/or lift frequently a minimum of 10 pounds and up to greater than 50 pounds occasionally Commitment to HCF mission, values, philosophy and Service Excellence Initiative Must be able to complete performance requirements independently while using good judgment as well as have the ability to harmoniously work with others Must be able to read, write and understand the English language Position Responsibilities:

Graduation from an accredited school of nursing. Current license as a Licensed Practical Nurse with the State Board of Nursing. CPR certification recommended.

posts.title: 企业选择招聘流程外包前景一直被看好
posts.text:
随着国内经济的不断发展，传统的人力劳动优势已经被技术密集型企业所替代，人才开始越来越受企业客户的重视。加上劳动力成本的上升，企业若想在合理控制成本的同时，留住人才，就得选择招聘流程外包服务。尤其是近些年来 招聘流程外包前景 不错，备受企业客户青睐，下面就让我们详细了解下有关招聘流程外包前景的分析吧。
企业传统的人力资源管理是由内部的人力资源管理人员进行操作的，对于企业来说在管理过程中出现的问题是多种多样的，而在应付这样或那样的问题时，往往自己并不能解决，而需要求助于管理咨询公司，这样又需要时间与费用，也就在不同程度上制约了企业接触这方面专家的机会。现在很多国内企业人力资源部门都处在由传统的人事管理向现代人力资源管理转变过程中，更需要专业方面的意见和指导，外包正是获得这一指导的一个有效途径。由此可见招聘流程外包前景十分不错。
在中国人力资源行业产品同质化严重的现状下，万宝盛华凭借着一批年轻的团队，在短短不到四年的时间即取得了非凡的成绩，现今，无论是在外企还是中小企业的HR中，提起万宝盛华大家都会表示这是人力资源企业中首屈一指的“品牌”。也正是因此说明了招聘流程外包前景一直被企业所看好。
虽然招聘流程外包前景不错，但是作为企业客户来说，如果想找到一个靠谱的招聘服务公司，就得认准市面上口碑最好、客户推崇的极佳招聘服务公司。万宝盛华一直致力于为企业提供各种用工类型，也成为业内服务最专业、最优质的用工平台，所以选择万宝盛华，值得大家信赖。如果您想了解更多有关招聘流程外包前景的介绍，可以点击进入万宝盛华微信公众号ManpowerGroupChina和万宝盛华微站http://weizhan.manpower.com.cn/了解详情。

thread.title: Britney Spears opened a children's cancer facility on Saturday (04.11.17) - 07-Nov-2017 - NZ Entertainment news
thread.title_full: Britney Spears opened a children's cancer facility on Saturday (04.11.17) - 07-Nov-2017 - NZ Entertainment news

posts.title: Britney Spears opened a children's cancer facility on Saturday (04.11.17) - 07-Nov-2017 - NZ Entertainment news
posts.text: Home > News > Entertainment Britney Spears opened a children's cancer facility on Saturday (04.11.17) The kind-hearted singer had donated $1 million from the ticket sales of her 'Piece of Me' Las Vegas residency to the Nevada Childhood Cancer Foundation's Britney Spears Campus in Las Vegas, and was "really excited" to cut the ceremonial ribbon to officially open the "amazing facility". 7 November 2017 She said: "I'm just really excited to be standing here for our new NCCF campus."We started fundraising in 2014 and we've raised $1 million to build this amazing facility to support the kids and the families everywhere. I'm so thankful to everyone for their generosity in making this a reality and making this happen."The 'Womanizer' hitmaker - who was joined by her boyfriend Sam Asghari at the event - was hailed a "special person" for her fundraising efforts for the facility.According to People magazine, NCCF CEO Jeff Gordon said: "We can't thank Britney enough being able to do this. Our dream for many, many years has been to be able to have one one building that all of our 45 programs can come together in one place. And that we are able to to today."And that doesn't happen without someone like Britney Spears."We saw a side of Britney Spears that so many people maybe don't have the opportunity to see. You realise what a special person Britney is."She's an incredible performer, we know all that, but she does care and the more we've gotten to know her, the more grateful we've become to her, and the kids have adored her."Steve Sisolak, the Clark County Commission chair, compared the generosity shown by Britney - who has sons Sean Preston, 12, and Jayden, 11, with ex-husband Kevin Federline - to that shown to the wider Las Vegas area after the Route 91 massacre last month.He said: "35 days ago our community when through something that we will never forget. People around the world got to see a side of Vegas that they had never seen before. They saw the love that Las Vegas has."Today is similar to that because until today people haven't totally understood what Britney Spears has meant to this community. We've all seen her on stage, we've all seen her perform and what a phenomenal performer and entertainer she is, but what's she's doing today is another side of Britney that unfortunately most of us haven't had the opportunity to see before."What she is doing today, and continues to do, is going to benefit thousands of children that comes through this facility, and for that we are sincerely thankful and very, very appreciative." © 2017 Bang Showbiz, NZCity Other Entertainment News

thread.title: 婆媳关系难道真是千古难题？
thread.title_full: 婆媳关系难道真是千古难题？ - 喜庆婚嫁 - 嘉论网|嘉兴人论坛

posts.author: 熊妈
posts.title: 婆媳关系难道真是千古难题？
posts.text:
一个女人步入婚姻，比较棘手的难题就是婆媳问题。
在踏入婚姻之前，受社会舆论的影响，女人就在想，要是自己遇到了一个传说中的“恶婆婆”会是什么样。要说 婆媳关系 是一大难题，绝对没有人会否认，怎么和婆婆和谐相处成了许多媳妇的烦恼。
两个陌生女人，因为一个男人而成为一家人，年龄的差异、生活背景的不同，两个人之间不可避免会出现矛盾。
寰�俊鍥剧墖_20171107123652.jpg (0 Bytes, 下载次数: 0)
下载附件 保存到相册
2017-11-7 12:38 上传
“ @洛若若 没有老公，我们两个就是完全的陌生人，陌生人！！有了老公，我们还是陌生人，只不过是更容易产生情绪矛盾了。 ”
“ @ 生活
我最烦的就是，长辈年纪大了，无论说了怎么过分的话或者做了过分的事情，最后都要来一句“不要跟长辈计较”，然后就可以继续为所欲为，想怎么样就怎么样了。 ”
“ @Hellokittyii 也许这世界最难处好的就是婆媳关系，但是从来没想过会这样的，关系那么复杂。 ”
“ @ 空
婆媳关系真难相处，自己的妈再不好也是自己的，婆婆再好都是别人的，区别对待也太明显了。 ”
婆媳关系原来这么可怕。
去年结婚的钟丽缇让大家特别羡慕，她和张伦硕站在一起，就是向全世界撒狗粮。
寰�俊鍥剧墖_20171107123649.jpg (0 Bytes, 下载次数: 0)
下载附件 保存到相册
2017-11-7 12:38 上传
在一次访谈节目中，钟丽缇被问到和张伦硕的妈妈是怎么和谐相处的，非常会照顾人的她这样回答：
寰�俊鍥剧墖_20171107123644.jpg (0 Bytes, 下载次数: 0)
下载附件 保存到相册
2017-11-7 12:38 上传
钟丽缇和张伦硕年龄相差12岁，可能很多婆婆对这样的媳妇都会有意见，但是张妈妈非常喜欢钟丽缇，婆媳二人好像并没有遇到什么矛盾。
说起婆媳相处，钟丽缇说很容易，那就是要 主动关心婆婆 。张伦硕也觉得钟丽缇在处理和家人相处的问题上比他好一百倍，热情的钟丽缇更是激发了一家人的活力。
寰�俊鍥剧墖_20171107123641.jpg (0 Bytes, 下载次数: 0)
下载附件 保存到相册
2017-11-7 12:38 上传
婆媳关系好像也没有这么紧张。
用什么样的方式待人，别人就可能会用同样的方式待你。避免婆媳矛盾，也要反思自己有没有好好去对待这份关系。
在《非诚勿扰》上看过黄菡老师讲到女生应该怎么和婆婆相处，就是 “两要”和“两不要” ：
『 两要 』 1.要把婆婆当领导。 你未必喜欢你的领导，但如果以尊重在先来相处，你和她的关系也会好一些。 2.要把婆婆当孩子。 如果把婆婆当作孩子，有些时候你不会太和她较真，你的心里也不会计较太多。
『 两不要 』 1.不要把婆婆当亲妈。 有无血缘关系对于两个人的相处会很不一样，发生冲突时，亲妈总会包容和迁就女儿，但要是和婆婆遇上强烈的冲突，两个人心中可能会留有芥蒂。 2.不要把婆婆当敌人。 媳妇和婆婆有一个情感的纽带，那就是你的老公她的儿子。为了共同爱的这个人，媳妇和婆婆怎么着都是一家人，都应该好好相处。
寰�俊鍥剧墖_20171107123625.jpg (0 Bytes, 下载次数: 0)
下载附件 保存到相册
2017-11-7 12:38 上传
或许婆媳关系的问题没法完全解决，但儿媳妇和婆婆的共同出发点都是想更好地去爱一个共同的男人。 via备婚那些事

thread.title: Hibe desteğiyle sera kurdu, İstiridye Mantarı yetiştiriyor
thread.title_full: Hibe desteğiyle sera kurdu, İstiridye Mantarı yetiştiriyor | Erzurum Flaş Haber

posts.author: erzurumflas.com
posts.title: Hibe desteğiyle sera kurdu, İstiridye Mantarı yetiştiriyor
posts.text:
Kütahya’nın Şaphane ilçesinde yaşayan Mehmet Emin Gürbüz, Genç Çiftçi projesi kapsamında aldığı 30 bin lira hibe desteğiyle kurduğu serada İstiridye Mantarı yetiştiriyor.
Şaphane Halk Eğitim Müdürü Fuat Bayri, Halk Eğitim Merkezi tarafından mantar yetiştiricilik kursunu başarıyla bitirip, Gıda, Tarım ve Hayvancılık Bakanlığınca finanse edilen kırsal kalkınma destekleri kapsamında hibe desteğinden faydalanarak tesis kuran Mehmet Emin Gürbüz’ü ziyaret etti.
Mantarların yetişmeye başladığını dile getiren Gürbüz, “Tesisi geziyorum, sık sık mantarlara bakıp kontrol ediyorum. Onlar da ilgi istiyor, ilgileniyorum ve mantarların yetiştiğini görmek beni de çok rahatlatıyor. Hobi gibi başladık ama şimdi ticaretini yapıyoruz.3 aylık periyotlar halinde yaklaşık 3 ton mantar üretiyorum. İzmir’e toptan kilosunu 7 TL’ ye satıyorum. Tam olgunlaşmamış olanlarını biraz daha bekletip Simav ve çevre ilçe pazarlarında satılması için pazarcı esnaflarımıza satıyorum. 120 metrekare kapalı alan kurdum. Eşim sürekli bana destek oluyor. Hasat döneminde yevmiye ile işçi tutuyorum. Sıfırdan başladığım bu işte ailemle birlikte iyi bir yol aldık. Bize bu imkanı sunan Hükümetimizden, mantar yetiştiriciliği kursunu bizlere veren Halk Eğitim Müdürlüğümüzden Allah razı olsun. Bize güvenenleri mahcup etmemek için çalışmaya ve üretmeye devam edeceğiz” ifadelerini kullandı.(YD-EFE)

It can be beneficial or costly, if someone blows up you can submit weaker players at other positions, or as in my case this week mccoy got me 2 points, so i had to use stronger picks due to his limited results. everyone has the same option, making it all level J
kidman, in regards to Thursday roster, I only suggested that if you have chosen a player that is on Thursday then one must have the entire roster in for that week.

thread.title: Повече зеленчуци и плодове, по-малко сол и захар в детските градини
thread.title_full: Повече зеленчуци и плодове, по-малко сол и захар в детските градини

posts.title: Повече зеленчуци и плодове, по-малко сол и захар в детските градини
posts.text:
Повече зеленчуци и плодове, по-малко сол и захар в детските градини Днес, 09:12 У нас / Общество • Животът / Здраве • 0 коментара 
Повече зеленчуци и плодове и по-малко сол, захар и брашно ще има в храните в детските градини. Това заяви в "Денят започва" проф. Стефка Петрова от Националния център по обществено здраве и анализи. Очаква се новият сборник с рецепти за хранене в детските градини да бъде одобрен в началото на 2018 година. Проф.Стефка Николова, Национален център по обществено здраве и анализи: В основата на новия сборник с рецепти в детските градини е българският модел на хранене. Традиционните български храни са застъпени с разнообразни рецепти. Не ние трябва да се съобразяваме с тези 2,50 лв на дете, а държавата , за да има качествени храни като сезонни плодове, защото това определя храненето на децата. Важно е сега да се научат да се хранят здравословно. 
Относно включването на модерни храни, които са по-скъпи, като като чия, киноа и авокадо, тя уточни, че това не са продукти, които ще бъдат ежедневно в менюто на децата, а са включени за разнообразие. Проф. Николова каза, че ще се опитат много сладките храни и добавени захари да не се слагат в храната. Проф.Стефка Николова, Национален център по обществено здраве и анализи: Препоръчваме обезсолено сирене. В обикновеното има 3,5 до 4 гр. сол, което е страшно много за децата. Имаме подход за намаляване на солта и добавените захари и намаляване на брашната. Искаме децата да опитат всичко и да имат подход. 
Проф. Николова заяви още, че се надява и на съдействие от регионалните здравни инспекции, които имат отговорността да контролират. Яна Алексиева, детски психолог и изпълнителен директор, Асоциация "Родители": За нас не е толкова съществен сборникът, а как се изпълнява, как се прави едно детско меню, кой го прави, как се прави. Важно е как ще научим и родители, и деца да спазват хранителен режим. Детската градина е добър подход да научим децата, че ябълката е полезна и без да е подсладена. 
Алексиева заяви още, че не вижда проблем в суперхраните като авокадо и чия.
